column1: Little Goat Diner////Love the Little Goat! The staff is so friendly and accommodating
column2: and the ambiance is really relaxed and  comfortable. The corned beef hash was  delicious....crispy
column3: thin hash browns and slivers of corned beef topped with eggs...ridiculously good. Their oatmeal is like no other oatmeal ever before! (I know that sounds odd...it's oatmeal
column4: right?) It's creamy and sweet and comforting and a great way to start your day! Can't wait to go back!
